faq_1.q: Do I need a learner’s permit to book lessons?
faq_1.a: Yes — in Québec, you need to hold a valid learner’s permit or foreign license to take improvement lessons. This ensures you're legally allowed to drive with an instructor beside you.

faq_2.a: bsolutely. We encourage booking at least 5 to 7 days before your desired date, especially during peak SAAQ exam periods or weekends.

faq_3.q: Can I rent a car for the SAAQ exam without taking lessons?
faq_3.a: Yes! You can rent a certified vehicle from us even without taking lessons, as long as you meet SAAQ eligibility requirements and have your exam appointment scheduled.

faq_4.q: What’s the minimum age to take improvement lessons?
faq_4.a: You must be at least 16 years old and legally allowed to drive with a certified instructor in Québec. If you're under 18, parental consent is required.

faq_5.q: I have a foreign license — can I still take lessons?
faq_5.a: Absolutely. We help many drivers with international licenses prepare for their SAAQ conversion exam through targeted improvement sessions.

faq_6.q: How much do lessons or car rentals cost?
faq_6.a: Prices vary depending on the service and location. You can check base rates on our Booking page or contact us directly for a custom quote.

faq_7.q: What’s included in the car rental for the SAAQ exam?
faq_7.a: The rental includes a certified vehicle, time for the test itself, and optional warm-up driving before the exam depending on the package.

faq_8.q: How do I book a service?
faq_8.a: Visit our Booking page, choose your service, and fill out the form. We’ll contact you to confirm availability and next steps. You can also call us directly to book.

faq_9.q: Can I cancel or reschedule a booking?
faq_9.a: We kindly ask for at least 24 hours’ notice to cancel or reschedule. Short-notice cancellations may incur a fee.

faq_10.q: Do you offer lessons in other languages?
faq_10.a: Yes! Lessons are currently available in French, English, and Arabic — depending on instructor availability. Let us know your preference during booking and we’ll do our best to accommodate.
